availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William P. Adcock (Trimble County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Trimble County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Susan Merchant Adcock in Trimble County, Kentucky, on July 25, 1853. Father of John H. Adcock. Farmer in Trimble County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Trimble County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, p. 44.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, District, p. 396A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Trimble County Marriages, Film #000420400, p. 207.
